concept.title: Authorization for read-only administrators
concept.shortdesc: There are two types of read-only administrators in Couchbase: the read-only Couchbase administrator and the read-only LDAP administrators.

dlentry.dd: The read-only Couchbase administrator has a restricted read-only access to Couchbase Server functions. The read-only administrator can view certain activities without having ability to edit.
These administrators are set up using the Couchbase Web Console.
Read-only LDAP administrators are set up only when LDAP authentication is enabled for Couchbase Server. They can view certain activities without having ability to edit.
These administrators are set up using the Couchbase Web Console.
